title: Mortgage Rates Hit 5.27%, Highest Level Since 2009
sub_head: Home-loan rates have surged from 3.22% at start of year
body:
The steady climb in mortgage rates shows no sign of slowing down.
The average rate for a 30-year fixed-rate home loan rose to 5.27% from 5.1% a week earlier, housing-finance giant Freddie Mac said Thursday. That marked the weekly figureâ€™s highest reading in nearly 13 years.
